Joko Framework's documentation
==============================

Another Header
==============
 
Explanation for something.::
	
	print 'see ya'
	>> see ya
::

Text, followed by code sample box.::
	x = 1
	y = 2
	a = square_sum(x, y)
	
	if a > 10:
		print(a is bigger than 10)
	elif a == 10:
		print(a is equal to 10)
	else:
		print(a is lower than 10)

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
